/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The road is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings flank the sides of the road, their architecture hinting at the local culture and lifestyle. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of nature and architecture.
